original_text: And when the voice had spoken, Jesus was found alone. And they kept silent and told no one in those days anything of what they had seen.
korean_text: 소리가 그치매 오직 예수만 보이더라 제자들이 잠잠하여 그 본 것을 무엇이든지 그 때에는 아무에게도 이르지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: And when the voice had spoken,
and told no one in those days anything of what they had seen.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날들에는 자기들이 본 것을 아무에게도 말하지 않았습니다.
